text: Ronald Henderson was St. Louis' 31st Chief of Police. He was an officer for 29 years and Chief for 6½ years in the Metropolitan Police Department, City of St. Louis, becoming the second African-American Police Chief of St. Louis. He was previously St Louis' Police Commissioner from 1995 to 2001. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1949 births Category:American police chiefs Category:Commissioners of the St. Louis Metropolitan Police Department Category:American municipal police chiefs
title: Ron Henderson
